item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Introduction Welcome to my website. Here, I will usually post Devlogs, Tutorials, and random papers about programming and computer science in general. About I’m a 15 year old student who’s just keenly interested in game and software development. I’m also interested in music and musical theory even though I’m bad at composing stuff. I consider myself to be a slow but steady learner who can grasp stuff pretty well. I also have a constant hunger of knowledge and the new techs.
